schema_version.hidden comment: Bump the default in the subclasses.

step_run.description: Reference to analysis step run in pipeline
step_run.title: Analysis step run

___href.comment: Internal webapp URL for document file

quality_metric_of.description: One or more files that this metric either applies to or is calculated from.
quality_metric_of.title: Files

items.description: A particular file associated with this quality metric.
items.comment: See file.json for a list of available identifiers.
items.title: File

description: Schema for reporting number of reads per gene category in RNA-seq. https://www.gencodegenes.org/pages/biotypes.html
title: RNA-seq gene type quantification quality metric

___unitary_pseudogene.description: Number of reads in a species-specific unprocessed pseudogene without a parent gene, as it has an active orthologue in another species.
___unitary_pseudogene.title: Number of reads in unitary pseudogene

___IG_C_gene.description: Number of reads in immunoglobulin gene belonging to the immunoglobulin constant group according to the IMGT.
___IG_C_gene.title: Number of reads in immunoglobulin constant gene

___bidirectional_promoter_lncrna.description: Number of reads in non-coding locus that originates from within the promoter region of a protein-coding gene, with transcription proceeding in the opposite direction on the other strand.
___bidirectional_promoter_lncrna.title: Number of reads in bidirectional promoter lncRNA

___TR_C_gene.description: Number of reads in T-cell receptor (TcR) gene belonging to the T-cell receptor constant group according to the IMGT.
___TR_C_gene.title: Number of reads in TcR constant gene

___processed_transcript.description: Number of reads mapped to genomic regions which don't contain an ORF.
___processed_transcript.title: Number of reads in processed transcript

___vaultRNA.description: Number of reads in short non coding RNA gene that forms part of the vault ribonucleoprotein complex.
___vaultRNA.title: Number of reads in vault RNA

___snRNA.title: Number of reads in small nuclear RNA

___macro_lncRNA.description: Number of reads in unspliced long non-coding RNA that is several kb in size.
___macro_lncRNA.title: Number of reads in macro lncRNA

___transcript_id_not_found.title: Number of reads in transcript whose ID is not found

___non_coding.description: Number of reads in transcript which is known from the literature to not be protein coding.
___non_coding.title: Number of reads in non-coding gene

___sRNA.title: Number of reads in small RNA

___unprocessed_pseudogene.description: Number of reads in pseudogene that can contain introns since produced by gene duplication.
___unprocessed_pseudogene.title: Number of reads in unprocessed pseudogene

___IG_C_pseudogene.description: Number of reads in inactivated immunoglobulin gene belonging to the immunoglobulin constant group according to the IMGT.
___IG_C_pseudogene.title: Number of reads in inactivated immunoglobulin constant gene

___TEC.description: TEC is used for non-spliced EST clusters that have polyA features. This category has been specifically created for the ENCODE project to highlight regions that could indicate the presence of protein coding genes that require experimental validation, either by 5' RACE or RT-PCR to extend the transcripts, or by confirming expression of the putatively-encoded peptide with specific antibodies.
___TEC.title: Number of reads in gene to be experimentally confirmed

___transcribed_processed_pseudogene.title: Number of reads in transcribed and processed pseudogene

___scaRNA.title: Number of reads in small Cajal body-specific RNAs (scaRNAs)

___antisense.description: Number of reads in transcripts that overlap the genomic span (i.e. exon or introns) of a protein-coding locus on the opposite strand.
___antisense.title: Number of reads in antisense RNA

___IG_V_pseudogene.description: Number of reads in inactivated immunoglobulin gene belonging to the immunoglobulin variable group according to the IMGT.
___IG_V_pseudogene.title: Number of reads in inactivated immunoglobulin variable gene

___IG_J_pseudogene.description: Number of reads in inactivated immunoglobulin gene belonging to the immunoglobulin joining group according to the IMGT.
___IG_J_pseudogene.title: Number of reads in inactivated immunoglobulin joining gene

___ribozyme.title: Number of reads in ribozyme gene

___sense_overlapping.description: Number of reads in long non-coding transcript that contains a coding gene in its intron on the same strand.
___sense_overlapping.title: Number of reads in gene containing intronic gene

___translated_unprocessed_pseudogene.title: Number of reads in translated but unprocessed pseudogene

___polymorphic_pseudogene.description: Number of reads in pseudogene owing to a SNP/DIP but in other individuals/haplotypes/strains the gene is translated.
___polymorphic_pseudogene.title: Number of reads in polymorphic pseudogene

___TR_V_gene.description: Number of reads in T-cell receptor (TcR) gene belonging to the T-cell receptor variable group according to the IMGT.
___TR_V_gene.title: Number of reads in TcR variable gene

___sense_intronic.description: Number of reads in long non-coding transcript in introns of a coding gene that does not overlap any exons.
___sense_intronic.title: Number of reads in intronic transcript

___processed_pseudogene.description: Number of reads in pseudogene that lack introns and is thought to arise from reverse transcription of mRNA followed by reinsertion of DNA into the genome.
___processed_pseudogene.title: Number of reads in pseudogene from processed RNA

___misc_RNA.title: Number of reads in miscellaneous other RNA

___IG_V_gene.description: Number of reads in immunoglobulin gene belonging to the immunoglobulin variable group according to the IMGT.
___IG_V_gene.title: Number of reads in immunoglobulin variable gene

___TR_J_pseudogene.description: Number of reads in inactivated T-cell receptor (TcR) gene belonging to the T-cell receptor joining group according to the IMGT.
___TR_J_pseudogene.title: Number of reads in inactivated TcR joining gene

___transcribed_unprocessed_pseudogene.title: Number of reads in transcribed but unprocessed pseudogene

___IG_J_gene.description: Number of reads in immunoglobulin gene belonging to the immunoglobulin joining group according to the IMGT.
___IG_J_gene.title: Number of reads in immunoglobulin joining gene

___TR_J_gene.description: Number of reads in T-cell receptor (TcR) gene belonging to the T-cell receptor joining group according to the IMGT.
___TR_J_gene.title: Number of reads in TcR joining gene

___Mt_tRNA.title: Number of reads in mitochondrial tRNA

___protein_coding.title: Number of reads in protein coding gene

___snoRNA.title: Number of reads in small nucleolar RNA

___transcribed_unitary_pseudogene.title: Number of reads in transcribed unitary pseudogene

___lincRNA.description: Number of reads in long, intervening noncoding (linc) RNA.
___lincRNA.title: Number of reads in linc RNA

___3prime_overlapping_ncrna.description: Number of reads in transcript where ditag and/or published experimental data strongly supports the existence of short non-coding transcripts transcribed from the 3'UTR.
___3prime_overlapping_ncrna.title: Number of reads in 3' overlapping ncRNA

___IG_D_gene.description: Number of reads in immunoglobulin gene belonging to the immunoglobulin diversity group according to the IMGT.
___IG_D_gene.title: Number of reads in immunoglobulin diversity gene

___TR_D_gene.description: Number of reads in T-cell receptor (TcR) gene belonging to the T-cell receptor diversity group according to the IMGT.
___TR_D_gene.title: Number of reads in TcR diversity gene

___spikein.title: Number of reads mapped to RNA spike-in

___Mt_rRNA.title: Number of reads in mitochondrial rRNA

___TR_V_pseudogene.description: Number of reads in inactivated T-cell receptor (TcR) gene belonging to the T-cell receptor variable group according to the IMGT.
___TR_V_pseudogene.title: Number of reads in inactivated TcR variable gene
